Package windows

Interface SwitchableWindow

All Known Implementing Classes:
GameWindow, MainMenu, MapMakerWindow
public interface SwitchableWindow
Indicate that this content pane can be swapped in/out Contains method to return displayable container and method to switch to a new switchable window.
Version:
1
Author:
Robin

  • Method Summary

    Modifier and Type Method Description
    java.awt.Container getContent()
    Every switchable window needs to be able to return the content to be shown
    void switchWindow​(SwitchableWindow newcontent)
    Window switch function

  • Method Details

    • getContent

      java.awt.Container getContent()
      Every switchable window needs to be able to return the content to be shown
      Returns:
      Container that can be displayed

    • switchWindow

      void switchWindow​(SwitchableWindow newcontent)
      Window switch function
      Parameters:
      newcontent - - New content to be displayed
